title: Avatar, the last Goat Bender
body:
Chicken, Pork, Goat, Beef
Long ago the four meats lived together in harmony. But then everything changed when the beef nation attacked!
Only the Avatar, master of all Four Meats could stop them. But when the world needed him most, he vanished....
A hundred years past, and my brother and i discovered the new avatar, a goat bender named Aang. 
And Although his goat bending skills are great, he has a lot to learn before his able to save anyone.
But i believe Aang can save the world!

replies.body: Rito pls make this a champion
His ult shall cover the world in meat!
I only voted just to see who else voted (5 atm if including me)
